page.title: 18Facts About Village Children
page.content:
Out of 50 children between the ages of 5 and 9 years old, 18 went to Sunday School and only 9 went to church.
Out of 66 children in Barnby Primary School, 48 lived in families which had 2 children, 12 lived in families with 3 children and 4 were the only child in the family. The other two families had two children each but also had a grandparent staying permanently in the house.
Out of 68 children 27 had cats,24 had dogs and 16 had rabbits as pets.Also 32 other small animals were kept. These included mice,hamsters, guinea pigs and chickens.
